basics.name: John Doe
basics.label: Engineering Supervisor
basics.summary: I am a Mechanical Engineer with 8 years of product design experience with an emphasis on non-metallic materials used in oil field-related equipment, as well as a year in HVAC experience. Proficient in CAD and FEA software, experienced with ISO document control processes and ASTM/API/NORSOK requirements.

work.name: Company Name1
work.summary: Leading the design of high pressure choke and gate valve seals for a 33 million global manufacturer and supplier of precision machined plastic and composite components. Upholding quality standards that earned the AccuSeal facility ISO 9001 and AS9100 certification. Created material specifications and performed physical property testing of materials to ASTM standards. Develop and conducted process qualification for PEEK injection molding and PTFE compression molding processes.
highlights: ASTM Material testing and chemical evaluations of materials
Design and drafting of custom seal solutions

work.name: Company Name2
work.summary: R&D role designing and developing new sealing solutions for oil field service with a global manufacturer and supplier of sealing components. Managed and executed custom application tests.

work.name: Company Name3
work.summary: Oversaw the qualification and installation of HVAC systems in new and renovated academic facilities throughout Texas. Delegated work to contractors to ensure timely completion.

skills.name: General Skills
keywords: ASTM Material testing and chemical evaluations of materials
Design and drafting of custom seal solutions
